response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which holds immense value and potential for growth. Given its worth to you, we believe it's a perfect match for your needs and aspirations. We are offering this exceptional opportunity to you at a special price of $1,250,000. This offer reflects our commitment to making such high-quality products accessible while ensuring a fair return on our investment. We are confident that this investment will not only meet but exceed your expectations. Please let us know if you have any questions or need further details about the product. We look forward to discussing how this could be a mutually beneficial step towards achieving your goals.", "product_price": 1250000}
